Deemos didn't know these spots well neither, but he wasn't going to say any=
thing to Wrath about it. Inzola transformed to Termite mode and led the way=
...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:16 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


  Wrath: I'm sure we could find a good one. *Wrath begins walking t=
rough the jungle looking around* Wrath: Maybe you should lead. I don't know=
 these spots too well.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE =

    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 11:06 PM
    S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Inzola nods to Wrath and waits for Wrath t=
o lead the way. Deemos looked at Wrath.

    "You know, I used to hunt anim=
als, but I had so many animal heads on my wall, I started hunting robots. C=
aught my fair share of Maximals and Predacons, I did! But the ones here are=
 extra powerful, good challenge!" Deemos said to Wrath...
      ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
      Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 10:50 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


      Wrath: Hmm...Sound good to me! *Wrath says to Inzola*
        =
----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 9:05 PM
        Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


        Deemos just stares at him.

        "Wrath, we cou=
ld go and find someone to slag." Inzola said...
          ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
          Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


          Wrath: I don't really know......Damn... I never=
 plan ahead! Hmm...I haven't been aound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continu=
es thinking of something to do*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
           From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            S=
ent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


            Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrath.

         =
   "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
              ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
             =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Wrath begins walking for the =
jungle*
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From:=
 THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Sat=
urday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
                "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
                  =
----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
    =
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, Jul=
y 22, 2000 4:53 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        =
          Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
                 =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
       =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ly 22, 2000 4:39 AM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


     =
               "It's up to you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
   =
                   ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From=
: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
                      Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      *Wrath nods and smiles* Wr=
ath: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
                   =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
 =
                       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent=
: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
                        Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


                        "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyo=
ne already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

                        "G=
ood to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on =
the shoulder.

                        "Those Alliance and Preds will be so=
rry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

     =
                   "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a few=
 stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
            =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From:=
 ilovealllizards 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
                   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                  =
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                          *Wrath smil=
es* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to d=
o...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
                         =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: THECODE =

                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      =
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                            Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                            Inzola smiles and sh=
akes Wrath's hand.

                            "Nice to meet such a charmi=
ng and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged =
for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

                       =
     "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
    =
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
           From: ilovealllizards 
                              To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
                              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12=
:53 AM
                              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        =
                      Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Dee=
mos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand=
 shake*
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
                           From: THECODE 
                                T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Saturday, July=
 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                                Subject: Neo Beast Wars
=


                                Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it b=
eeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

                                =
"Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

    =
                            "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

           =
                     Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                    =
            Artist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he bel=
ieved exercises him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. =
He runs into the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, vario=
us thoughts pass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

               =
                 "Oh, that was some blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artis=
t said.

                                "Plintissa? Where are you my love?=
 Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered that she was i=
n the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran to Plintiss=
a. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                                "Pli=
ntissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Pl=
intissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and =
they kissed. After the kiss.

                                "Do me a favo=
r, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

           =
                     "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" A=
rtist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.
=

                                Dracona held up her scanning device in fro=
nt of Scorponok's face.

                                "I can find that d=
evice I lost." Dracona said.

                                "Then I'll gi=
ve it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Drac=
ona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sin=
esis stared at her, mouths agape.

                                The Radi=
cons sat there still...
